alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:41AM CST until January 27 at 10:15AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River at Macon. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Significant overflow into lowland and cattle grazing land near the Highway 45 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 24.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 30.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Noxubee River Macon 28.0 24.8 Thu 10 am CS 29.2 25.6 26.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 1045 PM CST.
